We must accept that our development model cannot be ______, that which works in Pakistan may not work in Peru.
After high school,she got a job in one of the few workplaces with wheelchair-______ bathrooms.
Those who used to ______ America for acting alone in the world cannot now stand by and wait for America to solve the world's problems alone.
It works its magic, again, through purely ______ means, so we can't really call those songs, and this puzzled me.
result.chn: 纯器乐的演奏方式,容我重申,能产生神奇的效果,所以我们其实不能把器乐称为歌曲,这让我很困惑(聆听音乐课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: They're derived from a ______ called triacylglyceride, which is as glycerol molecule with three fatty acid chains dangling off of it.
result.chn: 它们来源于一种叫三酰甘油的前体,由甘油分子上连接了,三个脂肪酸链构成(生物医学工程探索课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Movement down a concentration ______ occurs fairly rapidly over short distances like a micron or so, like the size of a bacterium.
result.chn: 顺浓度梯度扩散在一微米左右的短距离内,相当迅速,一微米相当于一个细菌的大小(生物医学工程探索课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: He expects to have what he called a ______ policy in place in the next few months.
If that's right, then it seems as though there'd be something ______ and inappropriate about simply disregarding those facts.
result.chn: 如果那是正确的，好像仅仅无视这些事实,有些不合理和不合适。(死亡课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: So in "At a ______ Music" and in the poem "Arcades," Milton turns to what he considered to be the greatest song of all: the music of the heavenly spheres.
result.chn: 所以在“在庄严的音乐“和诗歌的“商场“中“,弥尔顿指出了他认为的最美妙的音乐：,天体音乐。(弥尔顿课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: These ______ masquerades and charades that are part of his complexity reveal something about his identity.
result.chn: 这些华丽的化装舞会和猜谜游戏,揭露了他复杂个性中的一部分(欧洲文明课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: In that case,your ______ plant might not be so ______.
"Global non proliferation, to be successful, should be universal,comprehensive and non-______ and linked to the goal of complete nuclear disarmament."
"To see a neighbor that really was a ______, an underdeveloped authoritarian country now emerge as a model,as a leader, must be very frustrating."
